page.title: 07Outside
page.content: When we have finished our lunch, we put our hands up. When my mum has said we can go, we go and put our lunchboxes in the corridor. Those who have school lunches just go outside after cleaning their plates up. We play games outside. My friend Catherine and I usually play handstands or we play Tag, which is a catching game. Our playtime goes on for three quarters of an hour, so we have a long time to play. If the day is sunny we go up to the school playing field. If it is raining, we have to play inside. Our playground is very small and there are lots of children playing outside so we are always falling over. If we do fall over we go to my mum and she makes us better.
